title: AHS: 1984 Episode 3 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed! | "Slashdance"
author: Think Story
comment: 0:03... I put a little hat on the mask too!
My theory: they're all murderers and Camp Redwood is Hell, where they're being punished for their sins.
The saddest part of the episode is when asthma jingles died 😪
I think Margret killed everyone, blamed it on Jingles, and Donna knew this and so is working with Jingles to get revenge on Margret.

Soo if Montana was dating the Night Stalker the whole time, then my guess is he was the one who flashed his headlights at her and the Camp Counselor in the pond. I think the fear on her face was being caught cheating when originally I assumed it was fear of Jingles.
description:
The new season of American Horror Story: 1984 is here and we're going to breakdown episode 3 "Slashdance" with theories and details you missed!
